quote: Rusty has the expertise, knowledge and motivation to make your buying/selling needs go better than you expect! I'm not kidding! I was truly blessed to have found Rusty to help me with my home sale.
We were first time home buyers trying to buy in a very competitive market, and Rusty helped us navigate the process with patience and honesty. We always felt like he had our best interests at heart.
Rusty did an amazing job. He wasn't pushy, he listened and he responded in a timely manner. He was super patient with us. He had strategies to help us get our house!

We met Rusty and Richard at an open house that we just happened upon. We had been looking for a home for almost a year. They expertly guided us through the entire process with professionalism and care.

All of the prior highly positive reviews are spot on. Rusty and Richard teamed to help us sell and buy our house. They expertly helped us work through a challenging situation with skill and dedication.

The process of purchasing my first home was very overwhelming. But I'm glad I had a very knowledgeable, personable and patient agent on my team. Rusty not only helped me find my dream home but made the whole experience enjoyable.
